extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Apache OFBiz Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of Apache OFBiz to determine if it is below version 18.12.11.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Apache OFBiz version below 18.12.11?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Apache OFBiz
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Apache OFBiz to version 18.21.11 to mitigate the vulnerability.
